entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 9 April 2023
